title: PMS 2.0 772 - Happy Halloween, OVERREACTION MONDAY, PAFL Week 8 Recap, Monday Evening Football Preview, Adam Schefter, & AJ Hawk
description: On today's show, Pat, AJ Hawk, and the boys celebrate Halloween and chat about everything that happened in a wild weekend of Pro American Football League action, including all the good teams who continue to ascend, the teams we thought were going to be good who aren't good at all, they preview tonight's Monday Evening Football game between the Cincinnati franchise and the Cleveland franchise, and everything else we need to know as we wrap up week 8. Joining the progrum to give an update on what trades may be on the horizon as we approach the trade deadline, how CMC has paid off for the San Francisco franchise thus far, which marquee players may be on the move, and much more (1:27:42-1:38:25). Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow to watch the show. We appreciate the hell out of all you. See you tomorrow for Aaron Rodgers Tuesday , cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
